subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Texas’ 2007 season got off to a rough start yesterday with two players being suspended for the first three games.The Longhorns reported to training camp in Austin, and Coach Mack Brown announced that linebacker Sergio Kindle and defensive end Henry Melton, each charged with driving while intoxicated this summer, would miss three games.
